remarks: Split a group sum into two parts.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumsplit as of 5-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumsplitOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.i $e |- ( ph -> ( C i^i D ) = (/) ) $.
gsumsplitOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> A = ( C u. D ) ) $.
gsumsplitOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( ( G gsum ( F |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( F |` D ) ) ) ) $.
